name: B.O.A.T.S
description:
Press the flag to start the game.
Move with the Arrow keys and shoot with X and C.

Naval Fighting Action game inspired by Smash Bros.
Made for simplejam 2016

Code, Art, Sfx and Music by Sparrowspell
twitter: @Sparrowspell

01-07-2016 update
Fixed the timer and enabled true sudden death, before it would start to count below zero instead of going to sudden death mode.
